actions.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 3 (Roll no. 241).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 3 (Roll no. 241).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.

description: An amendment numbered 123 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to strengthen and reform the Iraq and Afghanistan Special Immigration Visa programs, and expresses the sense of the House that these programs are of significant importance to the US mission, and should be extended and reformed before their expiration.
purpose: Amendment provides for improvement of the Iraq and Afghanistan Special Immigration Visa programs and expresses the sense of the Congress that these programs are of significant importance to the U.S. mission and should be extended before their expiration.
